data.lyric:
[ti:Can't Take A Joke (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Can't Take A Joke (Explicit) - Drake
[00:01.37]Producer：ModMaxx/Noel Cadastre
[00:02.75]Ayo blast that sh*t Maxx
[00:04.32]Blast that sh*t back if you blastin'
[00:08.12]Ayy
[00:11.65]UberX to Hidden Hills
[00:12.89]Give me somethin' I can feel
[00:14.21]If they come to Hidden Hills
[00:15.58]Then I know they know the deal
[00:17.04]We just right there up the road
[00:18.38]You could hit it with a stone
[00:19.76]I be out here on my own
[00:21.08]I'm just tryna set the tone
[00:22.46]I've been kicked when I was down
[00:23.89]None of that sh*t matter now
[00:25.27]N**gas think they run the town
[00:26.62]'Til we run 'em out of town
[00:28.03]And they gotta relocate
[00:29.35]Gotta dip from where they stay
[00:30.72]Everything will be okay
[00:32.09]Man just stay up out my way
[00:33.78]Skit around ends with the bros and I'm kitted to the toes
[00:36.95]If I touch studio then we got one
[00:39.44]I be tryna laugh with the bros 'bout the opps that we know
[00:42.46]But they can't take a joke 'cause it's not one
[00:44.81]Think it's 'cause we live by the code reputation to uphold
[00:48.05]Makin' me the one they gotta take the spot from
[00:50.39]I be tryna laugh with the bros but they can't take a joke
[00:58.05]Ayo blast that sh*t Maxx
[00:59.68]Blast that sh*t back if you blastin'
[01:03.33]Yeah yeah
[01:06.43]Back and forth to Italy
[01:07.51]My comment section killin' me
[01:08.93]I swear I get so passionate
[01:10.25]Y'all do not know the half of it
[01:11.73]I grew up with the Reps Up boys we crashin' it and splashin' in
[01:14.40]And when I say they crashin' it I do not mean a accident
[01:17.09]I'm I'm still in the studio at 6:45
[01:20.51]And my haters either on they way to work or they arrived
[01:23.17]And I gotta own the things I rap about just for my pride
[01:25.94]You know when it comes to pride I can't put that sh*t aside
[01:28.74]I've been kicked when I was down
[01:30.08]None of that sh*t matter now
[01:31.43]They be throwin' in the towel
[01:32.81]I do yellowtail at TAO
[01:34.27]They be watchin' what they say
[01:35.58]Especially when it's to my face
[01:36.93]Everything will be okay
[01:38.31]Man just stay up out my way
[01:40.03]Skit around ends with the bros and I'm kitted to the toes
[01:43.21]If I touch studio then we got one
[01:45.64]I be tryna laugh with the bros 'bout the opps that we know
[01:48.67]But they can't take a joke 'cause it's not one
[01:51.07]Think it's 'cause we live by the code reputation to uphold
[01:54.33]Makin' me the one they gotta take the spot from
[01:56.55]I be tryna laugh with the bros but they can't take a joke
data.trans:
[ti:Can't Take A Joke (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.37]//
[00:02.75]尽情嗨起来吧
[00:04.32]尽情吼起来吧
[00:08.12]//
[00:11.65]用最便宜的UberX打车服务回到Hidden Hills小区
[00:12.89]给我一些我能感觉到的东西
[00:14.21]如果他们来到我家
[00:15.58]那我肯定 他们知道怎么回事了
[00:17.04]我的房子就在路边上
[00:18.38]你可以朝它扔石头
[00:19.76]我会自己一个人来到这里
[00:21.08]我只是想定个基调
[00:22.46]在我处于低谷时 我被人落井下石
[00:23.89]现在这些都不重要了
[00:25.27]伙计们认为他们统治着整个城市
[00:26.62]直到我们把他们赶出城
[00:28.03]他们要搬走了
[00:29.35]要离开他们呆了很久的地方
[00:30.72]一切都会好起来的
[00:32.09]兄弟 别挡我的路
[00:33.78]到处厮混 最后成为了兄弟 我从头到脚地武装自己
[00:36.95]如果我联系录音棚 那我们就有了一个
[00:39.44]我想和兄弟们一起笑 关于那些我们知道的事情
[00:42.46]但他们开不起玩笑 因为没什么好笑的
[00:44.81]我想是因为我们生活在数码时代 要维护声誉
[00:48.05]让我成为他们要找的人
[00:50.39]我想和兄弟们一起笑 但他们开不起玩笑
[00:58.05]尽情嗨起来吧
[00:59.68]尽情吼起来吧
[01:03.33]//
[01:06.43]往返于意大利之间
[01:07.51]评论区的留言让我痛苦不堪
[01:08.93]我发誓我很生气
[01:10.25]你们一点也不了解
[01:11.73]我从小和Reps Up的成员一起长大 我们四处游荡
[01:14.40]我说的crashing it不是指意外事故
[01:17.09]6点45的时候我还在录音室
[01:20.51]讨厌我的人要么在上班的路上 要么已经到了
[01:23.17]我必须得到些什么 我为了自己的骄傲而说唱
[01:25.94]你知道的 说到骄傲 我可放不下那个
[01:28.74]在我处于低谷时 我被人落井下石
[01:30.08]现在这些都不重要了
[01:31.43]现在他们认输了
[01:32.81]我在洛杉矶吃生鱼片庆祝
[01:34.27]他们都在看他们说了什么
[01:35.58]特别是当着我的面时
[01:36.93]一切都会好起来的
[01:38.31]兄弟 别挡我的路
[01:40.03]到处厮混 最后成为了兄弟 我从头到脚地武装自己
[01:43.21]如果我联系工作室 那我就早就有了
[01:45.64]我想和兄弟们一起笑 关于那些我们知道的事情
[01:48.67]但他们开不起玩笑 因为没什么好笑的
[01:51.07]我想是因为我们生活在数码时代 要维护声誉
[01:54.33]让我成为他们要找的人
[01:56.55]我想和兄弟们一起笑 但他们开不起玩笑
